\chapter{public blueprint}
\label{public:welcome-to-nestegg-s-documentation}\label{public::doc}\label{public:public-blueprint}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{public:get--privacy}\pysigline{\bfcode{GET~}\bfcode{/privacy}}
Return static Privacy Policy.

\end{fulllineitems}



\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{public:get--about}\pysigline{\bfcode{GET~}\bfcode{/about}}
Return static About page.

\end{fulllineitems}



\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{public:get--tos}\pysigline{\bfcode{GET~}\bfcode{/tos}}
Return static Terms of Service page.

\end{fulllineitems}



\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{public:get--}\pysigline{\bfcode{GET~}\bfcode{/}}
Return home page, as well as a single random photo to be used as the background image.

\end{fulllineitems}



\chapter{users blueprint}
\label{users:users-blueprint}\label{users::doc}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{users:get--user-edit-profile-security}\pysigline{\bfcode{GET~}\bfcode{/user/edit-profile/security}}
Edit password for user.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Form Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{current\_password}} -- current password for user

\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{password}} -- new password for user

\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{confirm}} -- new password confirmation

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}



\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{users:post--user-edit-profile-security}\pysigline{\bfcode{POST~}\bfcode{/user/edit-profile/security}}
Edit password for user.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Form Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{current\_password}} -- current password for user

\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{password}} -- new password for user

\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{confirm}} -- new password confirmation

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}



\begin{fulllineitems}

Edit basic information for user profile.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Form Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{first\_name}} -- first name of user

\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{last\_name}} -- last name of user

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{users:get--user-unsubscribe}\pysigline{\bfcode{GET~}\bfcode{/user/unsubscribe}}
Unsubscribe current user using stripe ID from database.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{stripe\_token}} (\emph{str}) -- stripe ID

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}



\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{users:get--user-register}\pysigline{\bfcode{GET~}\bfcode{/user/register}}
Register user based on form parameters.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Form Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{username}} -- username

\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{password}} -- password

\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{email}} -- email address for user

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}



\begin{fulllineitems}

\item[{Form Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}

\end{fulllineitems}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{users:get--user-photo-(int-photo_id)}\pysiglinewithargsret{\bfcode{GET~}\bfcode{/user/photo/}}{\strong{int: }\emph{photo\_id}}{}
View the specified photo.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{photo\_id}} (\emph{int}) -- photo ID

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}



\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{users:get--user-(username)-gallery}\pysiglinewithargsret{\bfcode{GET~}\bfcode{/user/}}{\emph{username}}{\bfcode{/gallery}}
Public paginated gallery for user.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{username}} (\emph{str}) -- username

\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{page}} (\emph{int}) -- page number

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}
